# Welcome to the World of Fungi


$$\\[0.15in]$$

## Fungi are all around us, they appear as mushrooms, molds, mildews and more! There is fungi in our food, medicine, and even in our homes. 

$$\\[0.15in]$$

### This website is meant to serve as an introductory guide to just some of the hundreds of fungi that inhabit the state of New Hampshire.
